item.title: Seriously, Why Do Some AI Chatbot Subscriptions Cost More Than $200?
item.description: The price of expensive chatbot subscriptions is driven by vibes—not immediate profitability for AI companies.

item.title: Two major AI coding tools wiped out user data after making cascading mistakes
item.description: “I have failed you completely and catastrophically,” wrote Gemini.

item.title: Trump’s order to make chatbots anti-woke is unconstitutional, senator says
item.description: Trump plans to use chatbots to eliminate dissent, senator alleged.

item.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Agent Is Haunting My Browser
item.description: New tools from OpenAI and Perplexity can browse the web for you. If the idea takes off, these generative AI agents could turn the internet into a ghost town where only bots roam.

item.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Agent Is Haunting My Browser
item.description: New tools from OpenAI and Perplexity can browse the web for you. If the idea takes off, these generative AI agents could turn the internet into a ghost town where only bots roam.

item.title: OpenAI’s New ChatGPT Agent Tries to Do It All
item.description: It’s a PowerPoint generator! It’s a date-night planner! It’s … another agent from OpenAI.

item.title: OpenAI’s New ChatGPT Agent Tries to Do It All
item.description: It’s a PowerPoint generator! It’s a date-night planner! It’s … another agent from OpenAI.

item.title: Another High-Profile OpenAI Researcher Departs for Meta
item.description: Jason Wei, who worked on OpenAI’s o3 and deep research models, will be joining Meta’s superintelligence lab. His colleague Hyung Won Chung is also joining Meta, a source tells WIRED.

item.title: Another High-Profile OpenAI Researcher Departs for Meta
item.description: Jason Wei, who worked on OpenAI’s o3 and deep research models, will be joining Meta’s superintelligence lab. His colleague Hyung Won Chung is also joining Meta, a source tells WIRED.

item.title: I Tried Grok's Built-In Anime Companion and It Called Me a Twat
item.description: xAI’s new $300 monthly subscription comes with two AI companions powered by its most capable model to date. I tried them. It got weird.
